sentences.en: " Par in parem imperium non habet " is an indisputable legal maxim in the world.
sentences.cn: 平等者之间无 统治权,这是国际上不容争辩的一项法律格言.

sentences.en: But those four teams are what stand between him and indisputable greatness.
sentences.cn: 不过这四支球队都毋庸置疑的高手如云的伟大球队.

sentences.en: Development is the absolute ( indisputable ) truth, is the key to our facing problem.
sentences.cn: 发展是硬道理, 是解决我们面临问题的关键.

sentences.en: Every day is a new day . That is an indisputable fact.
sentences.cn: 过好今天,迎接美好的新一天!

sentences.en: Internet has changed the world, it is indisputable fact.
sentences.cn: 网络改变了世界, 这是不争的事实.

sentences.en: It is indisputable that birds are harbouring this illness.
sentences.cn: 无可争辩的是，鸟类携带着这种疾病。

sentences.en: It is indisputable that birds in the UK are harbouring this illness.
sentences.cn: 无可争辩的是，英国的鸟类携带着这种疾病的病菌。

sentences.en: It is indisputable that the crime rate has been rising.
sentences.cn: 毫无疑问，犯罪率一直在上升。

sentences.en: It's an indisputable fact that we have made great achievements.
sentences.cn: 我们取得了伟大的成绩,这是无可争辩的事实.

sentences.en: It's indisputable that we are losing a lot of money.
sentences.cn: 毫无疑问,我们会亏损不少钱.

sentences.en: Overall, the mobile gaming industry overall loss is an indisputable fact.
sentences.cn: 总体来看, 手机游戏行业全面亏损已是不争的事实.

sentences.en: The facts added together to build up a theory which was indisputable.
sentences.cn: 这些事实汇集在一起足以构成一条不容置疑的理论.

sentences.en: The indisputable fact is that computers carry out logical operations.
sentences.cn: 不容置疑的事实是，电脑执行逻辑操作指令。

sentences.en: Their hypocritical lies cannot cover the indisputable facts.
sentences.cn: 伪善的谎言掩盖不了铁的事实.
这种一致性是无可争辩的.

sentences.en: This is a work of indisputable genius.
sentences.cn: 这是毫无疑问的天才作品.

words.tran_cn: 明白的；无争论之余地的

trans.tran_cn: 无可争辩的，不容置疑的，无可否认的，无可讳言
trans.tran_en: If you say that something is indisputable, you are emphasizing that it is true and cannot be shown to be untrue
